```{r}
theta_chain <- rbind(
  theta_chain_1,
  theta_chain_2,
  theta_chain_3,
  theta_chain_4,
  theta_chain_5,
  theta_chain_6
)
```

```{r}
d = 5
n_theta = 3426
bs_estimates = apply(theta_chain[5001:10000,], 2, mean)
mu = bs_estimates[3406:3410]
sigma = bs_estimates[3411]
cov_m = matrix(0,5,5)
cov_m[lower.tri(cov_m, diag = TRUE)] = bs_estimates[seq(n_theta-14, n_theta)]
cov_m[upper.tri(cov_m)] = t(cov_m)[upper.tri(cov_m)]
beta = matrix(bs_estimates[1:3405], ncol = d)
```


```{r}
dt = df_rm %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  group_by(id) %>% 
  mutate(wind_lag = lag(wind_kt,1),
         lat_shift = lag(latitude, 1) - lag(latitude, 2),
         long_shift = lag(longitude, 1) - lag(longitude, 2),
         wind_shift = lag(wind_kt, 1) - lag(wind_kt, 2)) %>% 
  drop_na()

dt_res = dt %>% 
  select(id, nature, season, month, wind_kt, wind_lag,lat_shift, long_shift, wind_shift) %>%
  nest(data = nature:wind_shift) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(beta_0 = beta[,1],
         beta_1 = beta[,2],
         beta_2 = beta[,3],
         beta_3 = beta[,4],
         beta_4 = beta[,5]) %>% 
  unnest(data) %>% 
  mutate(wind_kt_pred = beta_0+beta_1*wind_lag+beta_2*lat_shift+beta_3*long_shift+beta_4*wind_shift)

head(dt_res)
```


### Linear Models 

```{r}
dt_res = dt_res %>% 
  rename(year = season) %>%
  mutate(
    decade = (year - min(year))/10
  )

dt_long <- dt_res %>% 
  select(decade, year, nature, month, beta_0, beta_1, beta_2, beta_3, beta_4) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    c(beta_0:beta_4),
    names_to = "beta",
    values_to = "vals"
  ) 

dt_long %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=vals, color=beta )) +
  geom_point()+
  facet_grid(beta~nature, scale = "free")

dt_long %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=vals, color=beta )) +
  geom_point()+
  facet_grid(beta~month, scale="free")

dt_long %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=nature, y=vals, color=beta )) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  facet_wrap(~beta)

dt_long %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=month, y=vals, color=beta )) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  facet_wrap(~beta) +
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(angle = -45))
  


beta0_mod <- lm(beta_0 ~ decade + nature + month, data = dt_res)
#summary(beta0_mod)

tab1 = beta0_mod %>%
  tbl_regression(   
    estimate_fun = function(x) style_ratio(x, digits = 3)
  ) %>%
  bold_p(t=0.05)

beta1_mod <- lm(beta_1 ~ decade + nature + month, data = dt_res)
#summary(beta1_mod)

tab2 = beta1_mod %>%
  tbl_regression(   
    estimate_fun = function(x) style_ratio(x, digits = 3)
  ) %>%
  bold_p(t=0.05)

beta2_mod <- lm(beta_2 ~ decade + nature + month, data = dt_res)
#summary(beta2_mod)

tab3 = beta2_mod %>%
  tbl_regression(   
    estimate_fun = function(x) style_ratio(x, digits = 3)
  ) %>%
  bold_p(t=0.05)

beta3_mod <- lm(beta_3 ~ decade + nature + month, data = dt_res)
#summary(beta3_mod)

tab4 = beta3_mod %>%
  tbl_regression(   
    estimate_fun = function(x) style_ratio(x, digits = 3)
  ) %>%
  bold_p(t=0.05)

beta4_mod <- lm(beta_4 ~ decade + nature + month, data = dt_res)
#summary(beta4_mod)

tab5 = beta4_mod %>%
  tbl_regression(   
    estimate_fun = function(x) style_ratio(x, digits = 3)
  ) %>%
  bold_p(t=0.05)

tbl_merge(
  list(tab1, tab2, tab3, tab4, tab5),
  tab_spanner = c("beta0", "beta1", "beta2", "beta3", "beta4")
) 

```
